summary: A handheld device to measure grass cover.

eligible.eligibleBullet03: assess grass cover by measuring total height and the number of measurements taken

eligible.eligibleText01: Plate meters that are not able to store data electronically for later electronic transfer are not eligible.
eligible.eligibleText02: You can only apply for 2 handheld pasture plate meters per application.
